title: Gateway Apartments - Downtown - 1 Bdrm / 1 Bath - Downtown Campbell!
map_address: 45 N 3rd St near E campbell ave
posting_body: ['The Gateway Apartments - Great Downtown Location', 'Up for lease, in the heart of Downtown Campbell, is a spacious 1 bedroom 1 bath 900 sq ft apartment with parking!', 'Available mid September!', 'Features and Amenities:', '- Secure Entrance', '- New Building', '- Private Parking', '- Excellent Downtown Location', '- Well maintained', '- Relaxing community for professional individuals', '- Water and trash are included in rent', 'Right outside you will have access to:', '- Top Rated Restaurants', '- Farmers Market', '- Shops', '- VTA Transportation', 'Enjoy the weekly farmers market on Sundays right outside your doorstep.', 'Common laundry is onsite.', 'Pet and Allergy Free Complex.', 'Available mid September!', '$2,845 / month - 1 year lease', '1 bed 1 bath', '900 Sq Ft', 'call or text', 'show contact info', 'Application Fee Waived!', '***No smoking, No pets***']
